summary:
### April 2025 Summary for scaffold-eth/scaffold-eth-2

- **Merged Pull Requests:**
  - **#1084:** Fixed the Address component to correctly copy addresses to the clipboard when used within a dialog, improving user experience.

- **Closed Issues:**
  - **#1085:** Resolved a bug that prevented users from committing changes in the latest version, enhancing functionality.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on improving user interface components and addressing critical bugs to ensure smoother operation of the application.

topIssues.title: Bug: Unable to commit changes in the latest version.

topPRs.title: Fix Address component copying address to clipboard
Split project for both pnpm and yarn support
